ResourceHeader.ResourceName: GNSS Receiver at Shigaraki MU observatory
ResourceHeader.Description: GNSS antenna (Trimble Zephyr type: TRM41249.00) placed on the roof-top of the main building at Shigaraki MU observatory in Shigaraki prefecture, Japan (34.86 N, 136.11 E, 385m MSL) acquires phase data in RINEX format on a continuous operation basis with a time resolution of 1-min interval since August 2011. Details can be found in the PDF document (http://trl.trimble.com/docushare/dsweb/Get/Document-452112/NetR8ReferenceReceiver_UserGuide_380A.pdf).

Instrument.InvestigationName: RISH GNSS receiver at Shigaraki (regular operation)
